hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Amr bin Shu'aib, from his father, from his grand father, that:the Messenger of Allah, returned his daughter Zainab to Abul-As bin Rabi', with a new marriage contract

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الزَّوْجَيْنِ يُسْلِمُ أَحَدُهُمَا قَبْلَ الآخَرِ
chapter.eng-name: When one spouse becomes Muslim before the other
